skills.name: CONTAMINATE
desc: • Deal magic damage to all enemies.
• Lower ATK and MAGIC of enemies for 1 turns.
• Reduces the Max HP of the target by 15%.

skills.name: CONTAIN
desc: • Reset Power of enemy to zero.
• Increase Power Generation of allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: LOCKDOWN
desc: Randomly removes all beneficial effects, including Golden Effects, and Seals an enemy’s ability every turn for 2 turns.
